sen.j: 平群 真鳥（へぐり の まとり、生年不詳）は雄略天皇・清寧天皇・顕宗天皇・仁賢天皇朝の大臣。
sen.e: HEGURI no Matori (year of birth unknown) was a minister to Emperor Yuryaku, Emperor Seinei, Emperor Kenzo and Emperor Ninken.
HEGURI no Matori (year of birth unknown) was a minister in the reigns of Emperor Yuryaku, Emperor Seinei, Emperor Kenzo and Emperor Ninken.
sen.cmt: a minister to --> a minister in the reigns of
sen.e: HEGURI no Matori (year of birth unknown) was a minister in the reigns of Emperor Yuryaku, Emperor Seinei, Emperor Kenzo and Emperor Ninken.

sen.j: 雄略天皇の御世に大臣となり、平群氏の全盛期を迎えさせる。
sen.e: He became a minister during the era of Emperor Yuryaku and brought the height of its prosperity to the Hegri clan.
He became a minister during the era of Emperor Yuryaku and brought the height of prosperity of the Hegri clan.
sen.cmt: brought the height of its prosperity to the Hegri clan --> brought the height of prosperity of the Hegri clan.
sen.e: He became a minister during the era of Emperor Yuryaku and brought the height of prosperity of the Hegri clan.

sen.j: 仁賢天皇の没後、自ら大王になろうとしたが、これに不満を抱いた大伴金村は小泊瀬稚鷦鷯尊（後の武烈天皇）の命令を受け平群真鳥を討ち、真鳥は自害し平群本宗家の一部は滅んだ（生存説もある）。
sen.e: After the death of Emperor Ninken, he attempted to assume the position himself but killed himself after defeated by OTOMO no Kanamura under the order of Ohatuse no wakasagi no mikoto (later day Emperor Buretsu) and the part of the Hegri clan head family had ended (there was also a rumor of survival as well).

After the death of Emperor Ninken, he attempted to assume the position himself, however OTOMO no Kanamura opposed Matori's intention and defeated him under the order of Ohatuse no wakasagi no mikoto (later day Emperor Buretsu); as a result, Matori killed himself and part of the Hegri clan head family went downfallen (there is also a rumor of survival).

After the death of Emperor Ninken, he attempted to assume the position himself, however OTOMO no Kanamura opposed Matori's intention and defeated him under the order of Ohatuse no wakasagi no mikoto (later day Emperor Buretsu); as a result, Matori killed himself and part of the Hegri clan head family went downfallen (there is also a rumor of survival).

sen.j: また、小泊瀬稚鷦鷯尊に命ぜられ、竹内文書を作ったといわれる。
sen.e: He was believed to make Takeuchi-monjo (an ancient text which recorded the lineage of ancient kami and a dynasty preceding Emperor Jinmu) under the order of Ohatuse no wakasagi no mikoto.
He is believed to have made Takeuchi-monjo (an ancient text which recorded the lineage of ancient kami and a dynasty preceding Emperor Jinmu) under the order of Ohatuse no wakasagi no mikoto.
sen.cmt: He was believed to make --> He is believed to have made
sen.e: He is believed to have made Takeuchi-monjo (an ancient text which recorded the lineage of ancient kami and a dynasty preceding Emperor Jinmu) under the order of Ohatuse no wakasagi no mikoto.
